name: Unspoken Spells
description:
Unspoken Spells is a puzzle game set in a fictional world where magic was prohibited by a regime. The player slips into the role of Cornelius, a therapist ordered to the prison Arcana's End to force the imprisoned mages to confess their alleged crimes. His first patient, the sorceress Martina, seems to be a lost cause until she takes him on a journey through her mind...

Unspoken Spells is the project of 6 university students who had 4 months to complete 1 game. Everything in our game was created from scratch and done by ourselves. Our team consists of

  • Andreas Macsek (Audio, Development)
  • Gabriel Pirchenfellner (Art)
  • Lukas Tyburczy (Lead Developer)
  • Nina Pils (Art)
  • Patrick Schneider (Development, Story and Documentation)
  • Tom Maurer (Art)

If you want to contact us, feel free to write to fishwithlegsstudios.schneider@gmail.com
